All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddAppointmentController
The AddAppointmentController is used add appointments to the database.
AddCustomerController
The AddCustomerController is used to add a customer to the database.
Application
The main application.
Appointments
The Appointments class provides methods for retrieving appointment information.
AppointmentsDao
Handles data manipulation and retrieval from the Appointments database table.
Contacts
The Contacts class provides methods for retrieving contact information.
ContactsDao
Handles data retrieval from the Contacts database table.
Countries
The Countries class provides methods for retrieving country information.
CountriesDao
Handles data retrieval from the Countries database table.
Customers
The Customers class provides methods for retrieving customer information.
CustomersDao
Handles data manipulation and retrieval from the Customers database table.
DBConnection
 
FirstLevelDivisions
The First Level Divisions class provides methods for retrieving and setting First Level Division information.
FirstLevelDivisionsDao
Handles data retrieval from the First Level Divisions database table.
IOUtil
The IOUtil class provides a method that writes the login activity to the login_activity.txt file.
LoginScreenController
The LoginScreenController is used to log login activity and allows navigation through the program on successful authentication.
NavigationScreenController
The NavigationScreenController is used to navigate to the customer page, appointment page, or report page after successful login.
ReportViewerController
The ReportViewerController is used to display the following reports: Appointment Count by Month and Type, Appointment Count by Country, and Contact Appointments.
TimeUtil
The TimeUtil class is used for managing the business hour times and getting the start and end of the current week.
UpdateAppointmentController
The UpdateAppointmentController is used to update the selected appointment from the ViewAppointmentsController.
UpdateCustomerController
The UpdateCustomerController is used to update customer information in the database.
Users
The Users class provides methods for retrieving user information.
UsersDao
Handles data retrieval from the Users database table.
ViewAppointmentsController
The ViewAppointmentsController displays appointment information in a Tableview.
ViewCustomersController
The ViewCustomersController displays customer information in a Tableview.
